name: Melange
tagline: Melange is a low level CSS framework. It supports general reusable codes for your ui
body:
Melange
=======

Melange is a powerful yet small CSS framework. It specialised for general usage thus most GUI related styles are
missing. Simply sets basic styles to elements, allows scalability and applies coding standardisation for different
type of projects.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
